metadata.description: A curated marketplace of Claude Code plugins and skills for enhanced development workflows

plugins.name: devloop
plugins.description: Lightweight development workflow with spike/fresh/continue pattern, git workflow integration (branch-per-plan, PR creation, PR feedback), 14 on-demand skills, and 6 specialized agents. Optimized for efficiency with minimal hooks and direct execution.

plugins.name: security
plugins.description: Comprehensive security plugin providing OWASP ASVS 5.0-aligned audits via /security:audit command with 17 domain-specific auditor agents, plus live security guard hooks for real-time vulnerability detection during code changes

plugins.name: ctx
plugins.description: Persistent memory for Claude Code agents. Stores decisions, patterns, and knowledge in a structured graph database across sessions with auto-injection and enforcement.
